actions.name: Primal Maw
actions.description:
Trigger: The user declares a [Jaw] attack.

Effect: The triggering attack loses 30% Power and gains [2-Strike] (or has its [X-Strike] increase by +2, without the Power decrease) until the end of the user's Activation.
